moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Zuko
characters.description: scarface, going through several stages of teen development, overall great guy

moves.name: Fire Hands
moves.description: Zuko attacks with burning red hands through strikes and punches

moves.name: Hot Head
moves.description: Zuko loses his cool and steam shoots from his ears and heats the atmosphere

moves.name: Volcano Blast
moves.description: Zuko creates a mini volcano that erupts right in front of his opponent

moves.name: Teen Angst
moves.description: Zuko chases his opponent with a series of combinations, fire and martial arts

new moves.name: Fire Breath
new moves.description: Aang harnesses his inner dragon, unleashing a breath of fire
